Title: Axe Shortage
Description: A mix-up with orders resulted in a severe shortage of new axes for our explorers. We have an immediate need for more Draconium Axes and are looking for all blacksmiths to pitch in. In return, I will impart new Blacksmithing Knowledge to you to assist in making even more epic pieces.
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Draconium Axes for Metalshaper Kuroko in Valdrakken.
